ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

name: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

editorialNotes.tagline: Get a job and have kids with a spin

editorialNotes.standard: Cool features like asynchronous multiplayer uplift the mobile version of this hit tabletop word association game.

ios.subtitle: Guess the word with video chat

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Switch on the laser pointer! Scoop the litter! Rub the belly of the all-seeing Pig-a-Corn! This mobile version of the insanely irreverent card game brings the fatal felines to our devices, along with a few purr-fect new twists. The hysterical illustrations by Matthew Inman (creator of The Oatmeal) spring to life with animation and sound—and a meter that tracks the chance of drawing an exploding kitten makes the game even more hilariously tense. Played face-to-face with friends or online against strangers, it’s surprisingly strategic and cat-astrophically fun.
Form smart alliances to keep the spice flowing in this superb digital reimagining of the popular board game.
Awesome reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.

editorialNotes.tagline: A dice roller on your wrist
This party game is the bomb!

ios.subtitle: Play vs. AI, friend, or online

name: Tsuro - The Game of the Path

editorialNotes.standard: This gorgeous digital board game couldn’t be any simpler to learn, but true mastery lies at the end of a long and winding path. As fans of Tsuro’s tabletop incarnation, we love how faithfully—and beautifully—the experience is re-created here. App-exclusive ways to play add new layers of depth, letting us get lost for hours among these tricky, twisty trails.
Scurry to victory with mountains of cheese by stealing from friends and evading the mousetrap in this lively digital reimagining of the popular board game.

name: THE GAME OF LIFE: Road Trip

editorialNotes.tagline: Twist on a classic board game

editorialNotes.standard: Expand your empire’s power by contending with Bronze Age civilizations in this sharp, streamlined strategy game.
